H0.text: Which public holiday is celebrated on the first Monday in September in the USA. Independence Day

H1.text: Which public holiday is celebrated on the first Monday in September in the USA. Memorial Day

H2.text: Which public holiday is celebrated on the first Monday in September in the USA. Columbus Day

H3.text: Which public holiday is celebrated on the first Monday in September in the USA. Laborday

A4.text: Memorial Day is observed on the last Monday of May.

A5.text: Labor Day is the unofficial end of summer.
